We’re making it easier to use Glean for online learning and video content, eliminating the need for multiple tabs and windows. Use our handy integrated side panel to take notes directly alongside online lectures and videos to maximize focus and retention, ensuring you don’t miss out on key information.

You must be a Glean user (excluding our Glean Teams plan) to access this extension. Not used Glean before? Try it free for 30 days at https://app.glean.co/try
